Known for a good reason as “the Jewel of the East Bay,” Walnut Creek is one of the most beautiful cities in the Bay Area.
If you’re looking for a one or 2-bedroom or studio apartment in the area, we know it's the place.
This beautiful apartment community offers an incredible location just a block from the city’s eponymous Walnut Creek, right along Walnut Boulevard.

Immediately to the southeast, you’ll find the city's bustling downtown area, complete with excellent shopping options at Broadway Plaza, which includes a Nordstrom, and great dining and bars like the upscale Residual Sugar Wine Bar.
Runners, cyclists, and horse riders will also be thrilled to find access to the famous Iron Horse Regional Trail close by, on the other side of the creek.
BART access to the rest of the Bay Area is also available nearby, just a short distance along Ygnacio Valley Road.

The Reserve at Walnut Creek is a beautiful apartment community that offers a variety of competitively priced floor plans and newly renovated units ready for move-in, with 598 square feet of studios and one-bedroom apartments ranging up to 720 square feet.
Two-bedroom Walnut Creek apartments range up to 1000 square feet.
You'll find fantastic shared amenities on the beautiful and lush community grounds, including a gym, pool, and outdoor sitting area.
Our stylish luxury apartments offer spacious floor plans, an array of terrific amenities, and beautiful features.
You'll find an alluring balance of design and convenience within our lovely apartment homes.
Pet Friendly: Indoor Dogs and Cats are welcome.
Additional $500 deposit per pet.
$35 monthly pet rent per cat, $50 monthly pet rent per dog.
Please contact the Leasing Office for details to learn more about breed restrictions.
